name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life and superior sound quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Watch Pro
description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, GPS, and waterproof design. Track your health 24/7.

name: Leather Laptop Bag
description: Professional genuine leather laptop bag with multiple compartments for 15.6 inch laptops. Stylish and durable.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with advanced cushioning and breathable mesh design. Perfect for marathons.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Insulated water bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours. Eco-friendly and leak-proof.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Non-slip eco-friendly yoga mat with extra cushioning for comfort. Perfect for all yoga styles.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Waterproof portable speaker with 360-degree sound and 12-hour battery. Take your music anywhere.

name: Sunglasses Classic
description: UV protection polarized sunglasses with stylish design. Protect your eyes in style.

name: Travel Backpack Pro
description: Durable travel backpack with USB charging port and anti-theft design. Perfect for travelers.

name: Coffee Maker Automatic
description: Programmable coffee maker with thermal carafe and auto-shutoff. Wake up to fresh coffee.

name: LED Desk Lamp
description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with touch control and USB charging port. Perfect for work and study.

name: Wireless Mouse Ergonomic
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with silent clicks and long battery life. Comfortable for all-day use.

name: Mechanical Keyboard RGB
description: Premium mechanical keyboard with RGB backlight and customizable keys. Perfect for gamers and typists.

name: Denim Jacket Classic
description: Timeless denim jacket with premium fabric and perfect fit. A wardrobe essential.

name: Wireless Earbuds Pro
description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and 24-hour battery life. Crystal clear sound.

name: Fitness Tracker Band
description: Smart fitness band with sleep tracking, step counter, and heart rate monitor. Stay healthy.

name: Canvas Sneakers
description: Comfortable canvas sneakers perfect for casual wear. Available in multiple colors.

name: Stainless Steel Cookware Set
description: Professional 10-piece stainless steel cookware set. Durable and dishwasher safe.

name: Gaming Mouse RGB
description: High-precision gaming mouse with 16000 DPI and customizable RGB lighting. Dominate the game.

name: Cotton T-Shirt Pack
description: Pack of 3 premium cotton t-shirts. Soft, comfortable, and breathable fabric.

name: Air Purifier Smart
description: Smart air purifier with HEPA filter and app control. Breathe clean air at home.

description: Adjustable dumbbell set from 5kg to 25kg. Perfect for home workouts.

description: Genuine leather wallet with RFID protection. Slim design with multiple card slots.

description: Fast-boiling electric kettle with auto shut-off and boil-dry protection. Stainless steel body.

description: Set of 5 resistance bands with different strength levels. Perfect for strength training.

description: Full HD webcam with auto-focus and built-in microphone. Perfect for video calls and streaming.

description: 1000W high-speed blender with multiple speed settings. Perfect for smoothies and soups.

description: Universal adjustable phone stand for desk. Compatible with all smartphones and tablets.

description: Comfortable premium cotton hoodie with kangaroo pocket. Perfect for casual wear.
